attributes.action: Pull our forces out of iraq, and allow iraq to deal with its own interests, regardless of whether america agrees with our choice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Support our troops, and show care for the British Army by immediately withdrawing our troops from an illegal and unwinnable war, started on falsified/exagerated information, which makes the vote in the house of commons, invalid. This should be done regardless of the political pressure applied by the US Government, as an expression of the british peoples veiw on this tragedy!

Iraq belongs to iraqi people, so allow them to choose their own lives, fates and destinys, because the countries only in this state due to the occupation by ours and american forces.

after withdrawal we can assist iraq, in the correct political arenas, with the support of the rest of the world.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
